How to add

Add films you want to see to your watchlist from the icon on each film poster, or click the Watchlist icon in the actions panel on a film or review page. Use the button above to import films to your watchlist using our import format, up to a maximum of 1,900 films per file.

Upgrade to remove ads

Letterboxd is an independent service created by a small team, and we rely mostly on the support of our members to maintain our site and apps. Please consider upgrading to a Pro account—for less than a couple bucks a month, you’ll get cool additional features like all-time and annual stats pages (example), the ability to select (and filter by) your favorite streaming services, and no ads!
